name: DeadFlame
description:
Made For Ludum Dare 50 - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/deadflame

Your alone...and in the woods, all you have is your axe and your pistol, and the dead are coming. Keep the flame alive, keep the dead out... its only a matter of time.

Controls

  • Movement: WASD
  • Weapon/Axe Select: Scroll
  • Deposit Wood: E ( Near Fire )

NightEmber is composed of primarily two programmers, 3D assets are Synty, all code is ours.
